entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
